mapper.sql: SELECT C_KEY, C_NAME, C_OWNER, C_ADDRESS, C_LOGO, C_SIGN, C_QRCODE, C_MILEAGE, C_CLOSEDAY, C_LEVEL FROM COMPANY
mapper.select: SELECT COORD_KEY_FK, CITY, LAT, LNG, COUNT FROM (SELECT COORD_KEY_FK, COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM COMPANY GROUP BY COORD_KEY_FK) JOIN COORDINATE ON(COORD_KEY_FK = COORD_KEY)
